entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY THIS MORNING, THEN CLEARING
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS THIS MORNING
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY AND BREEZY
HIGHS AROUND 80
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH, INCREASING TO 15 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 45 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

SHOWERS WITH THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
BREEZY WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 45 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 70
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
COOLER WITH LOWS AROUND 40
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY CLEAR
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY SUNNY AND BREEZY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 70
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT
